name: Vinit
quote: We had a great stay at this property. The host was very kind and responded quickly to all our queries, and the caretaker was also very nice and helpful. The place was clean, comfortable, and well maintained. The only thing to note is that it‚Äôs a bit far from the ghats, but apart from that, everything was excellent. Highly recommended!

name: Siddhant
quote: My stay at Karuna Villa was absolutely wonderful , one of the best parts was that all the major visiting sites were nearby, making it super easy to explore . I highly recommend staying here , you‚Äôll feel welcomed, relaxed, and well taken care of. Thank you Preeti, for being such an amazing host. Looking forward to coming back soon!

name: Rupraj
quote:
We had a pleasant stay at this place. The caretaker was very active in solving any issues. The bathroom was clean. 
Deendayal Hasthkala Sankul is nearby, walking distance. The stay was well lit by sunlight. Will definitely visit and stay again when I visit Varanasi. Thank you for making our stay memorable.

name: Pooja
quote: Had a great stay! The place was clean and comfortable, and the host was friendly and responsive. Location was peaceful and convenient, would definitely recommend!‚Äù

name: Anshika
quote: It was lovely staying at Karuna villa it was actually more beautiful from the picture now Karuna villa is our go to place every time we visit Kashi Thank you for the wonderful stay Preeti mam Saurabh Sir and Mangal bhaiya üå∏

name: Girish
quote:
Absolutely loved my stay! ‚ú® The place was even more beautiful than the pictures (no filter needed , spotlessly clean and wonderfully cozy. Host Preeti and caretaker Mangal Bhaiya were super sweet and made sure everything was perfect ‚Äî they even checked if I reached home safely!

Highly recommend this place and will definitely stay here again whenever I‚Äôm in Varanasi. üíØ

name: Nitish
quote: It‚Äôs safe,Secure and clean

name: Akanksha
quote: Truly one of the best airbnb experiences that I‚Äôve ever had. The place was clean, exactly matched the pictures (infact even more beautiful, ngl). The food was amazing and the host was truly welcoming and supportive. Felt like home.

name: Pankaj
quote: "Our stay was truly fantastic! The homestay is surrounded by beautiful greenery, creating a peaceful and refreshing environment. The house interior is well-designed, clean, and very comfortable. We had a wonderful experience and would highly recommend it to others."

name: Ankit
quote: Every detail is exactly how it is only the Air conditioning is not very fast and adequate for the room

name: Aditya
quote:
My mom and brother had a great stay here! The 2-BHK place was exactly as described in the listing‚Äîclean, well-maintained, and fully equipped. The neighborhood was peaceful, and essential services like Zomato and Uber were easily available. The host was excellent with communication and made everything smooth and hassle-free.

Happy to recommend this place to others!

name: Vaibhav
quote:
Absolutely Loved the Stay!
The property is exactly as described‚Äîclean, beautiful, and very well-maintained. The ambiance was amazing, and the fragrance inside the rooms was a standout touch that made the experience even more pleasant.

The caretaker was extremely supportive and ensured everything went smoothly. Check-in was quick and hassle-free. This is exactly how an Airbnb property should be maintained‚Äîkudos to the host!

Also, if you're into clicking pictures or planning to change your display picture, this place offers some fantastic backdrops. Highly recommended!

name: Shankar
quote: Preeti was responsive to my queries. The caretaker Mangal was also quite co-operative. Overall a nice stay.

name: Lopamudra
quote: The host, manager and the caretaker all of them were very responsive and took care of all our requests, they also let us check out late given that there next guests were checking in late, in short quite accommodating and responsive! The location is a bit far from the main temples and tourist attractions, 45-60 mins of ride one way to the ghats!!

name: Vansh
quote: It was really a great experience staying there & felt like home, I stayed there with my family and the place was very homely and full of good vibes the surrounding was so good and peaceful especially the balcony ,Vishal and Mangal bhaiya was very helpful already missing this place but will definitely go back there super soon ! Thanks again for everything we totally loved it.

name: Prakhar Anand
quote: I had a great stay in Preeti's Airbnb. The location was perfect: close to main attractions yet in a quiet, peaceful area, making the place good for exploring as well as relaxing. Her house was clean and so well maintained; it contained everything I needed for my comfortable stay. The kitchen was fully equipped, the bed very comfortable, and there were even some nice touches like snacks and coffee that made me feel right at home. Preeti was a fantastic host-super responsive, always available to answer any questions, and made sure everything was perfect throughout my stay. It's clear she puts a lot of care into her place, and it really shows in every little detail. Hands down, this has been one of the best Airbnb experiences. If you're thinking about staying here, don't think twice-you won't regret it! I'm already looking forward to booking this place again next time I'm in the area. Highly recommended!

name: Adarsh
quote:
This was my first trip to Banaras (Varanasi), and this property has been the best accommodation I've experienced so far. The check-in and check-out process was seamless. The ambiance was amazing, and I particularly enjoyed having access to the terrace.

For meals, they provide a menu with various food options you can order from. All major cultural and religious sites, including the Kashi Vishwanath Temple, are within a 10-12 km radius. Pro tip: Instead of booking cabs, use shared autos from the main road - they're much more economical.

Special mention to Mangal Bhaiya, who takes care of the property. He's among the most humble and helpful people I've ever met.

I highly recommend this property for anyone visiting Banaras!

name: Rishu
quote:
excellent place
excellent behavior
5 star rating

name: Dr Satyendra
quote:
This property is beautiful decorated and well maintained by the Host.The surrounding are very peaceful.
situated conveniently near the Varanasi ring road.
our family of 4 spent three days at this property which accurately matched the images provided .it features 2 bedroom
(AC in one bedroom), a kitchen and one big bathroom with geyser.
The co- host is also very accommodating.
The caretaker is available to assist and provide any necessary support. This property is ideal for 3 to 4 individuals. parking available.
pros Excellent and reasonable Price
Cons it is located approximately 12- 13 from Kashi temple and Ghats.

name: Mohit
quote: It was a very beautiful 2 BHK flat with a large hall with very beautiful furniture. The cleanliness and service were also good. Overall a peaceful and beautiful place to stay during your visits.

name: Keshav
quote:
Home away from üè° home
Really I mean it when I say this
All the things from exterior to interior ,service,responsiveness of the host were great.
The host Mrs. Preeti specially was always active and ready to help whenever needed.
The staff and caretaker are also ready to help.
I don't think i could get such treatment at any of the hotel.
Me along with my family had a great stay here üôÇ
Will surely stay whenever I come to varanasi again.

name: Bhargav
quote: Great stay, Nice ambience, Quick check in, feels like home away from home.

name: Rajat
quote: Place was good and easy reachable. Its around 18km from airport and it's a spacious 2bhk flat at 1st floor. Overall a nice stay.. Host was helpful and responsive.

name: Pradarsh
quote: My stay at Karuna Villa was absolutely wonderful! The location is perfect, nestled in a quiet neighborhood yet close to all the major attractions. The house was spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated, making it feel like a home away from home. The amenities were top-notch, especially the fully equipped kitchen and cozy living area. The host was incredibly responsive and provided excellent recommendations for local dining and activities. I would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. I can't wait to return!

name: Phungshokngam
quote: We had the best stay,the host ,the manager everyone was so helpful.I would still come and stay here again if I‚Äôm ever given the chance to visit this beautiful city in the near future..Thank you #karunavilla

name: Arpit
quote: The property is located at a peaceful locality. It's a pretty place to stay in. The rooms were spacious and neatly maintained. The staff was responsive and flexible with the timings. Further the owner was really sweet and helped us get things which we needed in no time. overall an amazing stay.

name: Rajat
quote:
The place is located slightly away from the city hustle and provides a homely vibe. At the same time, the location of the property has connectivity from the National Highway and few kms away from Kashi Vishwanath temple and the main city, thereby adding an advantage to reach the property location without worrying about the city traffic.

Our host, Preeti was very helpful and made sure of our comfortable stay. Alll our request was addressed by her and even the caretaker and the helper assigned by Preeti made sure that no stones were unturn in addressing any of our requests.

The stay was amazing and comfortable. I would highly recommend anyone planning to travel to Banaras to give Preeti and her staff to host your stay and enjoy your trip hassle-free.

name: Ankita
quote: the stay was awesome host was very very helpful enjoyed a lot
